doc.field: Aloha Inc said its leveraged buyout by AQ Corp, which acquired 91 pct of Aloha common and 82 pct of Aloha preferred in a tender offer that concluded December 26, has been completed for 28.50 dlrs per common or preferred share. AQ is controlled by Aloha chairman Hung Wo Ching, vice chairman Sheridan C.F. Ing and president A. Maurice Myers. Reuter
